titlestmt.titleproper: University Library Council and Teams RecordsUA226

publicationstmt.publisher: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-04-10 15:25:54 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

did.unittitle: University Library Council and Teams Records
did.abstract: This collection contains the records of the University Library Council and Teams.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: University records are closed for 20 years from the date of their creation. Records older than 20 years that do not pertain to student education, staff and faculty employment and Board of Trustees records are open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by the University Library Council and Teams, 2013 -- 2020, accessions 2013.091, 2014.051, 2015.050, 2016.085, UA-2019-010, and UA-2021-020.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized in thirty-two series: Central Database Team; Central Database to E-Resource Management; Circulation and Reserves Team; Citation Management Resources Activation Group; Collections Steering Team; Data Task Force; Digital Asset Management Team; Discovery Layer Task Force; Discovery Platforms Team; Document Delivery Team; Electronic Resources Management Team; Electronic Theses and Dissertation Team; Emerging Technology Activation Group; Hydra Administrative Interface; Integrated Library System Team; Integrated Library Managment System Task Force; Metadata Management Team; Music Library Move; Next Generation Discovery Task Force; Print Copy Contract Task Force; Print-Copy Contract Compliance Team; Publicity and Marketing Team; Statistical Category (SCAT) Team; Scholarly Communication Team; Services Steering Team; Springshare Team; Staff Development Team; Summon Implementation Task Force; University Library Council; Usability Activation Group; Web Resources Team; and Unprocessed accessions.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Directors of the Tufts University Libraries form the University Library Council (ULC), along with the Director of Univesity Library Technology Services, the Director of UIT Educational and Scholarly Technology Services (ex officio) and an Associate Provost (ex officio). The ULC reports to the Provost. The purposes of the ULC are to advance the operations of the libraries for the benefit of faculty, students, staff, administrators and practitioners; to recommend items that affect all Tufts libraries, including librarian promotions, personnel policies, creation of and appointment to university-wide library committees; to develop long-term plans and strategy for library information technology at Tufts; and to develop and implement strategic plans for Tufts University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: University Library Council and Teams Records, 1990 -- 2019. Tufts University. Digital Collections and Archives. Medford, MA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Services Steering Team records were processed by Leah Edelman in 2018. Records from other teams were processed by Jane Kelly in 2021. Materials were bagged using Bagger, zipped using 7-Zip, and ingested to the Dark archive. Received order was maintained. A file-level inventory and series-level description were created and the finding aid was updated at the time of processing.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains records created by the University Library Council and the library teams that report to the ULC, including agendas, charges and goals, correspondence, documentation, e-mail lists, meeting minutes, planning documents, and reports.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: University records are closed for 20 years from the date of creation. Records older than 20 years that do not pertain to student education, staff and faculty employment and Board of Trustees records are open for research.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series is arranged in received order.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains materials documenting the role and activities of the Services Steering Team, including annual reports, charges and goals, meeting minutes, and shared content such as elists, project management, Boston Library Council information, patron searches (aggregate information only), annual planning, and other material. File structure (Annual reports, Charges and goals, Meeting minutes, and Shared Content) mimics file structure on the Services Steering Team area of Libstaff (Sharepoint instance). Member lists are included; link lists and announcements are not.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Transferred by University Library Council and Teams, 2017, accession UA-2019-010, and 2020, accession UA-2021-020.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Services Steering Team was created to provide strategic planning and direction for the delivery of shared resources and services; offer a common forum to discuss library service issues and assign specific actions to address these issues in a timely fashion; solicit and communicates ULC priorities to the SST subgroups; channel the needs, priorities and outcomes of the work of the SST subgroups to ULC and other ULC groups as appropriate; and enable sharing of resources and expertise across the libraries.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Annual reports from FY03 through FY17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Charges and goals from FY04 through FY17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Meeting minutes from FY02 through FY17.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Elists, project management, BLC, patron searches, annual planning, and other shared content.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
